NetworkAdapter.description: A NetworkAdapter represents the physical network adapter capable of connecting to a computer network.  Examples include but are not limited to Ethernet, Fibre Channel, and converged network adapters.
NetworkAdapter.longDescription: A NetworkAdapter represents the physical network adapter capable of connecting to a computer network.  Examples include but are not limited to Ethernet, Fibre Channel, and converged network adapters.

title: #NetworkAdapter.NetworkAdapter
